author: Tony W
comment: It's OK, tbh I don't really see this being a paid watch face. I've tried a lot of faces and this one looks nice and I like the way it functions, but I wish there was more customization. And once you touch to change thru the different info displays it stays there even after the screen goes off which can be annoying. It should return back to displaying clock, or at least have the option.

author: Simon Fuller
comment: Nice and looks cool for Moto gen2 I wish there was an option to reduce the spectrum colour width in increments to the outta edge. The spectrum looks a bit thick to me imho and would be nice for the option to reduce it.

author: Shabbir Hassanally
comment: Beautiful watch face
Beautiful watchface

author: Ben Kopas
comment: I loved the watch face, looks great, looks even better digital, I just swiched from an android to an Iphone and I can no longer change the settings in android wear, not sure why?

author: Cody Ryan
comment: Settings are not changing on the watch face. I'm stuck with analogue and faranheit.

author: Nicholas Brown
comment: Change settings in the app, but won't transfer to the watch

author: Kurniawan David Syukur
comment: Great face I love it

author: Mitchel Wood
comment: Last update won't let me use digital. I've selected it in the Wear settings, but it doesn't change the watch face. Update: Fixed. The settings wouldn't take, but after switching momentarily to a different watch face and back again, the settings stuck.

reply.author: Ammarptn
reply.content:
Hi Michael,

May I know which is the current Google play service version on the your watch and phone?

Feel free to send an email to ammarptn@gmail.com for any feedback.

Best regard, 
Ammarptn

title: No digital

author: Steve Meder
comment: Moto 360 owners, if this face won't appear in the Android wear app, it's the fault of the moto connect app. Uninstall moto connect, uninstall this face and reinstall and face will appear. As for the face, very colorful and nice extra info with tapping the screen. Well worth the cost!
title: Great looking watch face

comment: This app will not sync to my watch

comment: This watch face look fantastic!!
title: Awesome!
